desc.help:
Get help on a command or specific command.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.role:
Get any role that starts with [r]
Users with `manage_roles` permission can add and remove any role below their top.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.echo:
Make me say something.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.react:
Make me react to a message.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.embed:
Create a fancy embed. Use {prefix}embedhelp for more info!

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.embedhelp:
Help for using {prefix}embed.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.clone:
Make a user say anything you want.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.rate:
I'll rate something, all my opinions are fact.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.ask:
Got a question? AidanBot will answer it, it'll probably be wrong tho.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.percent:
What percentage of something is you?

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.decide:
I'll pick a random result of given options.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.fight:
Fight someone or set 2 others up to fight to the death!!

Cooldown: 1 per 30 seconds.
desc.rps:
Classic game of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.slowmode:
Set the slowmode of the channel or thread.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.kick:
Kicks a given member.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.ban:
Bans a given member and can delete a certon days worth of messages.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.clear:
Purges a set of messages in a channel or thread.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.emoteify:
Create an emote from an image that you can use in the server with NQN.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
